name: Virat Kohli
about: Former Indian captain, one of the greatest batsmen of all time. Dominant force in international cricket. Holds numerous records.

name: Rohit Sharma
about: Indian captain, known for his explosive batting style. Holds the record for the highest individual score in ODIs. Five-time IPL champion.

name: Hardik Pandya
about: All-rounder, known for his aggressive batting and tight bowling. Led Gujarat Titans to IPL victory in 2022. Key player for India.

name: Ravindra Jadeja
about: All-rounder, known for his left-arm spin bowling and lower-order batting. One of the best fielders in the world. Key player for India.

name: Jasprit Bumrah
about: Right-arm fast bowler, known for his unique action and ability to bowl yorkers. One of the best T20 bowlers in the world. Key player for India.

name: Rishabh Pant
about: Wicketkeeper-batsman, known for his aggressive batting style. Led Delhi Capitals to IPL victory in 2022. Key player for India.

name: Shubman Gill
about: Elegant right-handed batsman known for his classy stroke play and solid technique. Rising star in Indian cricket.

name: Yuzvendra Chahal
about: Leg-spinner renowned for his clever variations and ability to take wickets in the middle overs.

name: KL Rahul
about: Stylish right-handed batsman and occasional wicketkeeper. Known for his consistency at the top of the order.

name: Mohammed Shami
about: Right-arm fast bowler, known for his ability to swing the ball both ways and deliver in crunch situations.

name: Surya Kumar Yadav
about: Dynamic right-handed batsman, known for his innovative stroke play and ability to accelerate the innings.

name: Ravichandran Ashwin
about: Off-spinner and handy lower-order batsman. Renowned for his cricketing intelligence and versatility in all formats.
